Util namespace

Detailed Description

Group of modules containing classes in the Util namespace.

Modules

 Statistical Accumulators
 

Classes that perform statistical operations (e.g., averages or autocorrelations) for sequences of values.

Serialization of C++ objects to/from file or memory.

Classes that model periodic boundary conditions.


 Container Templates
 

A set of container and iterator class templates.


 Crystal
 

Crystal periodicity and symmetry groups.


 Ensembles
 

This module contains classes that represent statistical ensembles for particular macroscopic variables.
